masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've tracked a massive gift card fraud operationâ€”they're draining cards before customers even activate them. Thousands of people are going to open worthless plastic on Christmas morning. The trail leads to some kind of tech-savvy operation. Can you trace the digital fingerprints?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Trace the gift card fraud network
  • Find their technical operation center
